title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Numerical answers do not need to be simplified for the second point.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Halving the diameter of the semicircle to find an expression for its radius may appear in the integrand, as presented. It may also appear as part of the constant multiple.

Numerical answers do not need to be simplified for the third point.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Numerical answers do not need to be simplified for the fourth point.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all four of the criteria below.
